lines.text: he wears a brown boot and a black one. That would have been inconceivable with the Germans.
[On Elsa's ad-libbed story about a letter of free conduct.]
She isn't just anyone, this lady.
No one is just anyone, right? Every man is someone... You wouldn't lie to me, would you?
You do know what they have to do with you in case you would lie to me?
She is going back to Budapest. Take the lady to my compartment.
And you, put away your weapon.
